item.title: Working with signals in rust
item.description: In this post, we'll take a look at linux signal handling in rust. Signals are an essential part of process lifecycle on linux, but working with them is often poorly understood - probably because it's not obvious that special care is needed. By the end, we'll get to an idiomatic way to receive signal information in application code.

item.title: Longevity in software engineering
item.description: How long should we expect themes and technologies in software engineering to last? In this post, we'll look at how long individual projects "last" based on data from GitHub and try to draw conclusions around what that means for choosing foundational software.
